original_text: ‘These rules are for a person who has had a disease on his skin. They are rules about how to make him clean. When the disease leaves the person, you must bring him to the priest.
korean_text: 나병 환자가 정결하게 되는 날의 규례는 이러하니 곧 그 사람을 제사장에게로 데려갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: These rules are for a person
sentences.korean_translation: 이 규칙은 한 사람을 위한 것입니다

sentences.original_text: who has had a disease on his skin
about how to make him clean
When the disease leaves the person
you must bring him to the priest
